header_text: You are on a walk with a group of friends and everyone you're with wants to go along a 5 mile path. As you walk the trail, you see that there is still a long time to go. You think that this walk will be tiring.

elements.text: You reach the end of the trail and your friends are taking pictures. Even though you're anxious, you go look around and...
